mapper.select: SELECT User_Name, Attendance_Date, date_format(Attendance_Time, '%T') as Attendance_Time, Attendance_Status FROM Attendance AS A LEFT JOIN document AS D ON A.Attendance_No = D.Attendance_No LEFT JOIN user AS U ON A.User_Id = U.User_Id WHERE A.User_id = #{id} /*AND Attendance_Status !=1;*/

SELECT U.User_Name User_Name, Attendance_Date, date_format(Attendance_Time, '%T') as Attendance_Time, Attendance_Status, Attendance_etc from Attendance AS A JOIN User AS U ON A.User_Id = U.User_Id ORDER BY U.User_Name, Attendance_Date ASC;
